snippet.title: Graphics Upgraded! Hero Guider Will Be Released on September 19, 2024!
snippet.description:
After a period of graphics upgrade work, Hero Guider is scheduled to be released on Steam on September 19, 2024! You can find the game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3083520/Hero_Guider/
Welcome to add the game to your wish list, thank you for your support!

Game Introduction:
USE LIMITED RESOURCES TO CONNECT THE ROADS
In each stage there are a limited number of resources that can be used for construction. Use these resources to connect the roads so that the hero can go through the maze. Don’t be afraid of failure since that you can try as many times as you want until you succeed.

TAKE ADVANTAGE OF VARIOUS MECHANISMS
There are many interesting mechanisms in the game. Characters can jump over obstacles using springboards, teleport through portals, and so on. Enter the game and explore more content!

50 PUZZLES TO SOLVE
50 well-designed levels from easy to difficult are waiting for you to solve. The first few levels are easy for players to solve with guidance. As the game progresses, the puzzles will become more and more difficult to meet the requirements of all puzzle lovers.

ABOUT THE AUTHOR
The author is an indie game developer from China and is looking forward to communicating with players. Don't hesitate to send email to bestqgame@gmail.com or bestqgame@163.com !
